name: Pastel Pink Puncher
description:
Pastel Pink Puncher is a fighting game with a twist.  Use some of your health points  in order to gain buffs and get an advantage over your enemy.

This was a solo project submission for Ludum Dare 44.

Controls

WASD - Player 1 Movement

Q, E - Strong Attack and Weak Attack for Player 1

Z, X, C - Buffs for Player 1

R - Block for Player 1

IJKL - Player 2 Movement

O, U - Strong Attack and Weak Attack for Player 2

M, comma, period - Buffs for Player 2

Y - Block for Player 2
